title: April Metal Type News
content:
The April edition of the Metal Type newsletter is now out. Click this link to take a look at the video: [http://j.mp/k5KA95](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820231925/http:/j.mp/k5KA95 "http://j.mp/k5KA95")

As well as the usual site news, you can see a slightly disappointing Intertype pin badge that I recently bought off Ebay!

If you don't already get newsletters from Metal Type, you can subscribe here: [http://bit.ly/n3wkjc](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820231925/http:/bit.ly/n3wkjc "http://bit.ly/n3wkjc")

The paperback version of "First Steps in Letterpress" - a book for absolute beginners - is now out: [http://j.mp/10f3UmO](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820231925/http:/j.mp/10f3UmO "http://j.mp/10f3UmO") If you would like to sell this book, online or offline, please get in touch for a generous bulk discount.

All the Best  
Dave Hughes  
York, UK
author: MetalType
